BranchUnitBusinessMember.name: BranchUnitBusinessMember
BranchUnitBusinessMember.description: Represents a user or contact who can perform a specific role for a branch.

BranchUnitId.description: The ID of the branch unit associated with this assignment.

BusinessUnitMemberId.description: A user or contact with a predefined role that can be performed at this branch.

EndDate.description: The date that this person stopped fulfilling this role for this branch unit.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether this role assignment can be used for this branch unit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of this branch unit business member assignment.

ServiceTerritoryMemberId.description: The ID of a service territory member record for the same user who can be assigned to service appointments in a service territory.

StartDate.description: The date that this person was assigned this role for this branch unit.
